display_long_description:
Different Modes:

NURBA, has different modes to play on, each of these modes have a unique goal.
These modes will have different outcomes, different playability. It all comes down to you to find a way to survive against the unknown.
These things will different, every mode will have a different goal. The goal is survival, but the way to survive is up to YOU!

New Updates:

These updates may change Nurba!, and make the game have a whole new perspective. Many of these update will bring new modes, items, and bring in new stuff for the community. These updates will change the game. We are still in development. You may see stuff that you don't expect to see.

One of a Kind Movement:

In Nurba! the movement isn't gorilla tag movement, it's a grip and pull movement to make running from monsters more fun!

Community Member:

Join us today, become a member of the Nurba community or as we like to call it "Project Nurba!" See you soon, if you decide to join! It's up to YOU!
